title: Fourteenth century bronze octagonal chandelier
collector: Creswell, K. A. C. (Keppel Archibald Cameron), 1879-1974
description: Photographer's description: Lustre de forme prismatique à douze cotes et six etages. Provenant de la mosquée Hassan: Fait par le maitre Badr Abou Yala en l'an mois (?) 730 de l'hég. (1329 J.C.). Translation of photographer's description: Twelve sided and twelve level prismatic chandelier from the Sultan Hassan Mosque: Made by master Badr Abu Yala in month (?) and the year 730 A.H. (1329 A.D.)
date-created: ca. late 19th century or early 20th century
collection: K.A.C. Creswell Photographs of Islamic Architecture
